president.title: The highest elected office in the country.

vice-president.title: The second highest elected office in the Philippines.

senate.title: What is a senator?
desc: A senator is an elected official of the Republic of the Philippines who is part of the upper house of Congress. Every 3 years, Filipinos must elect 12 of the 24 senators that make up the Senate of the Philippines. Each elected senator will serve six years in office, with a maximum of two consecutive terms.
